messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT :  "Infant Potty Training"
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, I have a question.  I’ve always been interested in this method.  But never read the book.  I guess I thought it would be beyond my reach.  Tell me some
messages.messageBody:
Ok, I have a question. Ive always been interested in this method. But
never read the book. I guess I thought it would be beyond my reach. Tell
me some of the subtle cues you look for and ways you deal with their
elimination in the bed at night and in the car. How often do the go at
night? And how often do you pull the car over? Oh, and how often do you
miss their cues?

Shan

-----Original Message-----
From: Bronwen To answer your question, I have used elimination communication
with my baby.
From five months he never wore a diaper. If I have another baby, there will
be no diapers ever.

www.naturalwisdom.com
"Diaper Free!" by Ingrid Bauer

It was fabulous incredible wonderful... please ask more. I would be very
pleased to answer.

ALSO- the woman who WROTE THE BOOK :-) is (or was) on this list.

Love,
Bronwen
